review.comment: It started with the coconut oil for my cooking. It's so fresh; the finish is really clean. Now, I buy a variety of oils and change it up everytime. I'm addicted!
review.review_reply: Thank you for sharing Joanne. Supporting your local craft oil-mill means a lot to us! We'll be having quite a few new oils coming out in 2022. And our fresh coconut oil will be back in stock again as well!

review.comment: Awesome cold pressed oils. I always look for them at the weekend markets on the mainland. I especially like their ghost chilli and scorpion chilli oils. I use it for breads and cooking. Really good quality oils on offer. I'll definitely try to find them again next month

I have to say these cold pressed oils are incredible. I can really taste the difference. I picked up a bottle from a farmers market and thought ok, it's nice quality oil, and then upon trying it, it went beyond my expectations. I am excited to try more flavours!
